extensionDescription.message: Facebook Container isolearret jo Facebook-aktiviteiten fan jo oare ynternetaktiviteiten en foarkomt dat Facebook jo mei cookies fan tredden bûten de Facebook-website folget.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

in-fbc-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

in-fbc-p1.message: Facebook kin jo no op dizze side folgje. Om dizze side út Facebook Container fuort te smiten, selektearje Websiden tastien yn Facebook Container en wiskje it fan de list.

on-facebook-subhead.message: Op Facebook en Siden yn de Facebook Container Boundary
on-facebook-subhead.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

on-facebook-p1.message: Dit piktogram ferskynt yn de Firefox-adresbalke as jo websiden besykje fan Facebook of siden dy't jo oan Facebook Container tafoege hawwe.
on-facebook-p1.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened into Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

on-facebook-p2.message: Dizze siden moatte tagong krije ta jo Facebook-identiteit (of witte wa't jo binne) om te wurkjen. Dit betsjut ek dat Facebook alles folgje kin wat jo dogge op dizze websiden.
on-facebook-p2.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop up when the user is on Facebook.

notOnFacebookHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

notOnFacebookText.message: Dizze website stiet bûten de Facebook-konteners. Dit makket it foar Facebook swieriger om jo op ynternet te folgjen.
notOnFacebookText.description: This is shown in the body of the panel pop-up when the user is NOT on a Facebook website, which has been automatically opened OUTSIDE Facebook Container. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

onUnknownSiteHeader.message: Dizze website stiet net yn de Facebook-kontener.
onUnknownSiteHeader.description: This is shown at the top of the panel pop-up when the user is on an "unknown" website - e.g., about:newtab. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Facebook Container".

facebookContainer.description: This is the name of the extension, and appears at the top of all onboarding panels. Please do not translate "Facebook Container".

onboarding1-subhead.description: This is the subhead of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding1-p1.message: Facebook kin jo sneupjen fierder as Facebook.com folgje. Bygelyks de Facebook Mei-'k-wol-oer- en Diele-knoppen, kinne jo folgje wêr't jo west binne – sels op siden dêr't jo net oer meie of diele.
onboarding1-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of onboarding panel 1. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding1-p2.message: Facebook Container makket in beheining tusken Facebook-websites en de rest fan it ynternet, sadat it foar Facebook swierder is jou online te folgjen.

onboarding2-subhead.message: Op Facebook en websites binnen de beheining fan Facebook Container
onboarding2-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding2-alt.description: This is alternative text for the icon in the second onboarding panel

onboarding2-p1.message: Dit piktogram ferskynt yn de Firefox-adresbalke as jo websiden besykje lykas Facebook.com, dy't binnen it Facebook Container-stek stean.
onboarding2-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the second onboarding panel.

onboarding2-p2.message: Dizze siden moatte tagong krije ta jo Facebook-identiteit (of witte wa't jo binne) om te wurkjen. Dit betsjut ek dat Facebook alles folgje kin wat jo dogge op dizze websiden.
onboarding2-p2.description: This is the second paragraph of the second onboarding panel. Please do not translate "Facebook Container"

onboarding4-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-p1.message: Sels as jo net op Facebook binne, kin Facebook jo online folgje. Knoppen wêrmei jo dingen op Facebook pleatse kinne of wêrmei't jo mei jo Facebook-account op websites oanmelde kinne, befetsje trackers. Facebook Container blokkearret dizze trackers en toant it stekpiktogram om oan te jaan wêr't trackers fuortsmiten binne.
onboarding4-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding4-img.message: Dizze ôfbylding lit sjen hoe't it stekpiktogram fan Facebook Container neist in ‘Mei-'k-wol-oer’-knop fan Facebook toand wurdt.
onboarding4-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fourth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-subhead.message: Oanmelde mei Facebook op oare websites
onboarding5-subhead.description: This is the subhead for the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p1.message: Om jo Facebook-oanmelding op oare siden te brûken, moatte jo se binnen de beheining ferpleatse. Klik op it stekpiktogram en selektearje ûnderoan 'Website tastean yn Facebook Container'.
onboarding5-p1.description: This is the first paragraph of the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-img.message: Dizze ôfbylding lit sjen hoe't de knop om in website oan de Facebook Container ta te foegjen yn it paniel ferskynt.
onboarding5-img.description: This is alternative text for the image shown in the fifth onboarding panel.

onboarding5-p2.message: Hjirtroch kinne jo jo oanmelde by Facebook, mar kin Facebook jo aktiviteit op dy website folgje.
onboarding5-p2.description: This is the second paragraph on the fifth onboarding panel.

btn-allow.description: This is a button to allows users to whitelist the domain, adding it to the Facebook container.

btn-cancel.description: This is a button to cancel out of the onboarding panel.

btn-next.description: This is a button to continue to the next onboarding panel.

btn-back.description: This is a button that returns the user to the previous onboarding panel.

btn-done.description: This is a button the user clicks to close out the panel when they have finished reading the text.

btn-arrow-back.message: Gean werom nei it foarige paniel.
btn-arrow-back.description: This is alternative text for the back arrow button.

btn-arrow-forward.message: Gean nei hoe Facebook Container wurket
btn-arrow-forward.description: This is alternative text for the arrow icon next to the "How Facebook Container Works" link

no-trackers-p1.message: Facebook Container hat gjin Facebook-trackers op dizze side detektearre. De side kin lykwols noch oare typen fan trackers befetsje.

learn-more.description: This is a link that opens a page with more information about Facebook Container.

how-fbc-works.description: This is a button that opens the Facebook Container onboarding flow.

trackers-detected-subhead.message: Wy hawwe jo beskerme tsjin Facebook.
trackers-detected-subhead.description: This is a subhead, and it means that the add on has protected the user by blocking Facebook trackers.

trackers-detected-p1.message: De Facebook-knoppen, dy't op winkel-, nijs- en oare websites toand wurde, befetsje trackers, dy Facebook litte witte wêr't jo op ynternet west binne. Sels wannear't jo dizze knoppen nea foar ‘Liken’ of dielen brûke, kinne dy trackers dochs gegevens oer jo sneupgedrach sammelje. Facebook Container blokkearret dizze trackers.

trackers-detected-p2.message: Facebook Container blokkearret dizze trackers. Wannear jo dochs op ien fan dizze knoppen klikke, kin Facebook jo folgje.

trackers-detected-fence-alt.description: This is alternative text describing the container fence icon.

sites-included.description: This is a header for the list of websites that are in the Facebook Container by default. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the language.

no-sites-added.description: This message is shown beneath the 'SITES YOU’VE ALLOWED' list header when no sites have been added to the contaner.

sites-allowed.description: This is the header for the list of sites the user has manually added into the Facebook Container. Capitalized letters are preferred if that makes sense/is feasible for the lanaguage.

sites-added-p1.message: Facebook Container stoppet Facebook-websites binnen de beheining. Jo kinne oare websites yn dizze beheining opnimme, Facebook kin dan lykwol mear fan jo sneupgedrach folgje.

button-allow-site.description: Button text that allows sites to be added to the Facebook Container

button-remove-site.description: Button text that removes an already-added site from the Facebook Container to the default container

button-remove-site-tooltip.message: Omdat dit in website is dy't eigendom is fan Facebook, kin dizze net út Facebook Container fuortsmiten wurde.
button-remove-site-tooltip.description: Tooltip that is displayed when hovering over the remove site button

remove-site-subhead.message: Side fan side út Facebook Container fuortsmite?

remove-site-p1.message: It fuortsmiten fan dizze side út Facebook Container betsjut dat de oanmelding mei Facebook-funksje net mear wurket en Facebook-trackcookies fuortsmiten wurde.

remove-site-p2.message: As jo opnij oanmelde wolle mei Facebook, moatte jo it wer tafoegje oan de Facebook Container.

add-site-subhead.message: Folgje troch Facebook op dizze website tastean?

add-site-p1.message: Hjirtroch kinne jo jo oanmelde mei Facebook, mar mei Facebook jo folgje wat jo op dizze website dogge.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share.message: Facebook Container hat dizze knop útskeakele en blokkearre dat Facebook jo besite fan dizze side folget.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-login.message: Facebook Container hat Facebook-trackers blokkearre. As jo op dizze side oanmelde mei Facebook, sil Facebook jo folgje kinne.

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p1.message: Tastean dat Facebook jo hjir folget?

inPageUI-tooltip-prompt-p2.message: Wannear't jo jo mei Facebook oanmelde, kin Facebook jo aktiviteiten op dizze website folgje. Dit kin harren helpe in wiidweidich byld fan jo online-libben gear te stellen.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-share-passive.message: As jo op dizze knop klikke, kin Facebook jo besite oan dizze website folgje.

inPageUI-tooltip-button-email.message: As jo hjir jo echte e-mailadres brûke, kin Facebook jo mooglik folgje. Klik foar mear ynformaasje.

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p1.message: Tastean dat Facebook jo hjir folget?

inPageUI-tooltip-email-prompt-p2.message: Dizze website kin jo e-mailadres diele mei Facebook, wêrtroch Facebook jo folgje kin. Brûk in service lykas Firefox Relay om jo echte e-mailadres te ferbergjen.
